name: Turtle Run (sonek)
description:
You  are  a   newly-hatched  baby  turtle,  making  your  journey  to  the  water  across  the  treacherous  beach.  Along  the  way  you  will  need  to  jump  over  obstacles, but  be  wary. Jumping  makes  it  easier  for  hungry   seagulls  to  spot  you  and  they  will  not  hesitate  to   devour  you  upon impact.  Use  palm  trees  to  shield  yourself  from  the  evil  gulls!

Special Thanks to my friend, Zade Dardari, for creating the music in my game. All his music can be found here: https://soundcloud.com/user-183798420
